parameters: Насчёт Смертельной Игры, в которой ты участвуешь."
\.\C[5]"В ней нет ничего особо сложного, так?
Однажды они были втянуты в жестокую Смертельную Игру...
они решили сотрудничать с другими участниками...\|\|
Но, увы, учитель \C[2]Казуми Мишима\C[0] стал первой жертвой.
И Джо, лучший друг Сары, тоже умер,
потому что не смог избежать своей судьбы.
Несмотря на её разбитое сердце, игра продолжалась...
Как бы отчаянно они ни пытались сбежать,
враг отдал свою жизнь, чтобы помешать этому.
И \C[2]Соу Хиёри\C[0], который не смог защитить Канну,
Сумев снять свой ошейник, он из последних сил...
\.Сара наконец воссоединилась со своим лучшим другом

\."This is the Your Turn To Die -Death Game By Majority-

and take each other's lives by majority vote!"

The protagonist, normal high school girl \C[2]Sara Chidouin\C[0].
One day, they were pulled into a cruel Death Game...
they cleared a \C[2]First Trial\C[0], then many more...
They chose to cooperate with the other participants
But their cooperation was in vain,
as high school teacher \C[2]Kazumi Mishima\C[0] died.
Then the Death Game began to pick up the pace...
After a cruel majority vote, \C[2]Kai Satou\C[0] died...
And Sara's best friend Joe died as well,
a Sub-Game called the \C[2]Trust Barter Game\C[0] was held.
"And now, it's time for a quiz!"
"Which of these was the victim of the Sub-Game?"
Rio Ranger, the doll run amok, was purged...
And Gashu, too, took his own life.
The Main Game occurred once more, and \C[2]Nao Egokoro\C[0] died.

The Death Game... is not over yet.
About that Death Game you were involved in."
\.\C[5]"It's not anything too difficult, is it?
A normal high school girl, \C[2]Sara Chidouin\C[0].
One day, they were pulled into a cruel Death Game...
they chose to cooperate with the other participants...\|\|
But alas, high school teacher \C[2]Kazumi Mishima\C[0]
There was no stopping that they would \C[10]kill each other\C[0].
And Sara's best friend Joe died as well,
As her heart crumbled, the peril only continued...
The next victim was singer-songwriter \C[2]Reko Yabusame\C[0].
The next victim was murderer \C[2]Alice Yabusame\C[0].
As desperately as they tried to grasp escape,
their enemies gave their very lives to stop it.
When the Main Game occurred once more,
The next victim was middle-schooler \C[2]Kanna Kizuchi\C[0].
And \C[2]Sou Hiyori\C[0], who'd failed to protect Kanna,
was left with a strong hatred of Sara.
Due to a malicious Joe AI...
using the last of his strength...
He started up a Joe AI.
\.At last, Sara reunited with her best friend,
and awoke from her long nightmare.
The Death Game... is not over yet.
